abilities.name: Piratical Raiders
abilities.rule: At the start of the battle, select one unit from your opponent’s army. Weapons equipped by models in this unit have the **[LETHAL HITS]** and **[PRECISION]** abilities while targeting that unit.

abilities.name: Mistshield
abilities.rule: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Channeller Stones
abilities.rule: Once per turn, the first time a saving throw is failed for the bearer’s unit, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

abilities.name: Faolchú
abilities.rule: Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit have the **[IGNORES COVER]** ability.

wargear_abilities.name: Mistshield
wargear_abilities.rule: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear_abilities.name: Channeller Stones
wargear_abilities.rule: Once per turn, the first time a saving throw is failed for the bearer’s unit, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

wargear_abilities.name: Faolchú
wargear_abilities.rule: Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit have the **[IGNORES COVER]** ability.

wargear_options:
■ If this unit contains 10 models, 1 Corsair Voidscarred’s shuriken rifle can be replaced with one of the following:
◦ 1 shuriken cannon
◦ 1 wraithcannon
■ The Voidscarred Felarch can be equipped with 1 mistshield.
■ 1 Corsair Voidscarred model equipped with a shuriken pistol and power sword can be equipped with 1 Faolchú.
■ If this unit contains 10 models, 1 Corsair Voidscarred’s power sword can be replaced with 1 fusion pistol.

■ For every 5 models in this unit, 1 Corsair Voidscarred’s shuriken rifle can be replaced with one of the following:
◦ 1 blaster
◦ 1 shredder

■ The Voidscarred Felarch’s shuriken pistol can be replaced with one of the following:
◦ 1 neuro disruptor
◦ 1 shuriken rifle
■ If this unit contains 10 models, 1 Corsair Voidscarred’s shuriken rifle can be replaced with 1 long rifle.
■ Any number of Corsair Voidscarred can each have their shuriken pistol and power sword replaced with 1 shuriken rifle.
unit_composition:
This unit can contain a maximum of 10 models.

■ **1 Voidscarred Felarch**
■ **4-9 Corsair Voidscarred**
■ **0-1 Shade Runner**
■ **0-1 Soul Weaver**
■ **0-1 Way Seeker**

**Every Corsair Voidscarred and Voidscarred Felarch is equipped with:** shuriken pistol; power sword; close combat weapon.
**A Shade Runner is equipped with:** shuriken pistol; close combat weapon; paired Hekatarii blades.
**A Soul Weaver is equipped with:** shuriken pistol; power sword; close combat weapon; channeller stones.
**A Way Seeker is equipped with:** shuriken pistol; Executioner; close combat weapon; witch staff.
